name: Sniper Target Zombie Killer
description:
Sniper Target Zombie Killer is required to eliminate the living dead city creatures infected by zombie virus. Zombie killer will face strong zombie attack and zombie defense and will require to use sniper shooter skills of sniper shooting or any other weapon of choice to tackle this biohazard zombie apocalypse situation on this living dead city which has now become a zombie land.
Features:
- 3D shooting zombie environment
- Stunning HD graphics
- Captivating soundtrack and effects
- Unique Missions
- One of the most epic weapons and arsenal
